fi.tamk.yourtrueself

Class YTSSkin

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Skin
      • fi.tamk.yourtrueself.YTSSkin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable

    public class YTSSkin
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Skin
    Custom Skin class that adds support for .ttf fonts. Uses FreeTypeFontGenerator to generate bitmap fonts.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Skin

        com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Skin.TintedDrawable

    • Method Detail

      • getJsonLoader

        protected com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Json getJsonLoader(com.badlogic.gdx.files.FileHandle skinFile)
        Overrides BitmapFont loader with a custom one that adds support for .ttf fonts.

        Copied from libgdx implementation and added .ttf support with a "dpSize" parameter for display independent pixel size.

        Overrides:
        getJsonLoader in class com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Skin
        Parameters:
        skinFile - skin file handle to load
        Returns:
        json file to load
        See Also:
        Skin.getJsonLoader(FileHandle)
